name: Okyeame Kwame
description: '''Kwame Nsiah-Apau''' (born 17 April 1976), known by his stage name '''Okyeame Kwame''' and nicknamed Rap Doctor, is a [[Ghanaian people|Ghanaian]] [[musician]], [[songwriter]], [[creative director]] fashion icon and a Developmental Activist. His dual roles as an artist and an activist have led to his recognition as an "artivist."
